af lock: Locked when shutter button is pressed half way
batteries: Rechargeable Li-ion Battery NB-3L (battery and charger supplied)
battery life:
Approx. 210 shots (LCD monitor on)
Approx. 550 shots (LCD monitor off)
Approx. 180 min (Playback)
continuous shooting: Approx. 2.2 fps¹ (speed maintained for up to 12 images)²
display formats: Single/ Index (9 thumbnail images)/ Slide Show/ Magnified/ Movie
menu categories:
(1) Recording Menu
(2) Playback menu
(3) Set-up menu
(4) My camera menu
(5) Function menu

modes: Auto, Manual, Long Shutter, Macro, Infinity, Stitch Assist, Movie
my camera: Start-up image and camera sounds customisation
photo effects: Vivid, Neutral, Low Sharpening, Sepia, Black & White
still image type: JPEG (Exif 2.2 [Exif Print] compliant) / Design rule for Camera File system, Digital Print Order Format [DPOF] Version 1.1 compliant
